channel.title: Portfolio on Marcos Azevedo (aka psylinux)
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Marcos Azevedo (aka psylinux)

item.title: Auto SSH
item.description: auto-ssh.sh :: This script will mount a auto file system using ssh and will open a ssh session with X11 Forward activated. You must set the Environment Variables first in order to use this script.

item.title: Internet Speed Report
item.description: Internet Speed Report :: Internet Speed Report is a simple command line script that automates internet speed testing by generating graphics report in .png format out of reports directory.

item.title: My Presentations
item.description: My Presentations :: Some of my presentations and published articles in different conferences".

item.title: Packer VM Templates
item.description:
Packer VM Templates :: is a collection of Packer.io templates used to automate the creation of Virtual Machine images.

Contain:

  • Kali Linux Template: A specific configuration (packer-kali-template) for building Kali Linux images.
  • Generic/Base Templates: Other general templates (packer-template). It is open-source (BSD 3-Clause License) and allows for reproducible builds of these VM environments as code.

item.title: POC Compiler
item.description: POC-Compiler.sh :: Simple Bash Script to compile the PoC files in C or Assembly (nasm) without any protection.
